description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Sandwich + Snacks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken Sandwich + Snacks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 slice Woolworths wholemeal soft sandwich bread

recipeInstructions.text: To make chicken sandwich, combine chicken, celery and mayonnaise in a bowl. Spread 1 slice of bread with chicken mixture, then top with lettuce and remaining slice of bread. Serve with cheese and tomato wedges.

To make bircher muesli, place apple, oats, yoghurt and sunflower kernels in a bowl and stir until combined. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Divide bircher among 3 airtight containers. Top each with blueberries. Serves 3. Store in fridge until required.
